channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10020] Add maven compile-protobuf profile
item.description:
Ad a maven profile to compile protobufs instead of the dev-support script which is only for hbase-protocol module. 


mvn test-compile -Dcompile-protobuf

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attaching patch to add the maven profile. Let's see what hadoopqa thinks.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12615437/hbase-10020_v1.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 9 new or modified tests.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/7974//console

This message is automatically generated.
Yeah, doesn't apply for me either Enis Soztutar Patch looks fine. You are uncommenting the work of Eric Charles? Thats good.

Enis Soztutar Any reason to put the BulkDelete in the example module and not in the protocole one? You could also generate in the target folder, so the generated class is not committed in the tree. Usually, or I don't generate and put in src, or I generate and don't put in src (but in target).

Thanks for looking. I guess this version of the patch was for 0.96. I'll update it.

Any reason to put the BulkDelete in the example module and not in the protocole one?

There is no changes to the proto classes. BulkDelete is just and example coprocessor demoing how to write one.

You could also generate in the target folder, so the generated class is not committed in the tree

We had discussed this in the initial PB discussions. We opted for committing the generated files, because we did not want to force having protoc installed for compiling PB. We can revisit that decision though (have to be in dev@)
Any chance the includes set for the protoc goals can be a wildcard instead of an explicit list of files?

Any chance the includes set for the protoc goals can be a wildcard instead of an explicit list of files?

I've tried that, but did not work for me.
Rebased the patch to trunk. Also removed dev-support/build-proto.sh, not needed anymore.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12615940/hbase-10020_v2.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 9 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

-1 javadoc. The javadoc tool appears to have generated 2 warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

-1 site. The patch appears to cause mvn site goal to fail.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-prefix-tree.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-client.html

Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-server.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop1-compat.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-examples.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-thrift.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop-compat.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8010//console

This message is automatically generated.
I've committed this (v2) to trunk and 0.96. change from v1 is trivial. Thanks for reviews.
